abstract: A group led by Kohlberg Kravis Roberts may borrow $11 billion to pay for their third attempt to buy the Coles Group, Australia’s second-biggest retailer. Citing unnamed sources, Bloomberg News reported that the group is in talks with Barclays, Citigroup, Credit Suisse, Goldman Sachs, the Royal Bank of Scotland and UBS regarding the loan.
